short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to tidy your browser by letting you hide, unhide, or remove tabs for a clutter-free experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HideMyTabs is a Chrome extension that lets you hide and manage your browser tabs with ease. Whether you're looking to focus on work, protect your privacy, or clean up your browser, HideMyTabs offers a smooth and efficient solution for a more organized browsing experience.

Features
    ğŸ”² Hide All Tabs: Hide all tabs with a single click and open a custom URL (e.g., a new tab page).
    ğŸ‘ï¸ Unhide Tabs: Instantly unhide any tab when needed.
    ğŸ—‘ï¸ Remove Tabs: Permanently remove tabs from the list for a clutter-free browsing experience.
    ğŸŒ Custom URL: Set a custom URL to appear when tabs are hidden, such as a new tab page.
    ğŸšª Hide Individual Tab: Right-click on any tab to hide it individually using the 'Hide Tab' option.

Why Use HideMyTabs?

    ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ’» Stay Focused: Hide distractions with a single click to enjoy a cleaner browsing environment.
    ğŸ”’ Privacy Protection: Temporarily hide tabs containing sensitive or personal information.
    âš¡ Boost Productivity: Keep your focus on the important tasks by hiding irrelevant tabs.
    ğŸ”„ Quick Access: Unhide any tab easily with a click when you need it. No more searching through multiple tabs.

How to Use

    Click the HideMyTabs icon in the toolbar to open the popup.
    Click Hide All Tabs to hide all tabs and open the custom URL you set.
    Right-click on any tab and select Hide Tab to hide that specific tab.
    To unhide tabs, click Unhide Tabs from the list of hidden tabs.
    Permanently remove tabs from the hidden list to keep your browsing organized.

This extension makes browsing smoother, with minimal distraction. ğŸ’» Try HideMyTabs today for a cleaner, more organized browsing experience!
